laboratory_examinations.findings: The patient's PIEZO1 gene harbored three rare single nucleotide variations (SNVs): c.1792G>C p.Val598Leu, c.2344G>A p.Gly782Ser, and c.2423G>A p.Arg808Gln. These SNVs in cis were confirmed by Sanger sequencing of DNA from all four family members and co-segregated with DHS.
Screened for all known primary lymphedema genes and confirmed the three PIEZO1 SNVs. No additional pathogenic variations were identified in various genes.
Showed low radioactive tracer speed in both limbs.
Normal and no thrombotic sequelae ensued.
